issue.title: [Java] Add hasNull flag to Vectors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5198](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5198). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add has null flag to Arrow Vector so that for vectors without any null, the null check process should be skipped.
